original_text: Now Cain said to his brother Abel, “Let’s go out to the field.” While they were in the field, Cain attacked his brother Abel and killed him.
korean_text: 가인이 그의 아우 아벨에게 말하고 그들이 들에 있을 때에 가인이 그의 아우 아벨을 쳐죽이니라

sentences.original_text: Now Cain said to his brother Abel
sentences.korean_translation: 이제 가인이 그의 아우 아벨에게 말하였다

sentences.original_text: Let's go out to the field
While they were in the field
